scripts.build:react-lite: microbundle src/react-lite.js -o lite.js -f cjs --compress && microbundle src/react-lite.js -o lite.js -f es --compress
scripts.build:preact: microbundle src/preact.js -o preact.js -f cjs --compress && microbundle src/preact.js -o preact.js -f es --compress
scripts.build:preact-lite: microbundle src/preact-lite.js -o preact-lite.js -f cjs --compress && microbundle src/preact-lite.js -o preact-lite.js -f es --compress
scripts.clean:react-lite: rimraf dist lite.js lite.js.map lite.esm.js lite.esm.js.map lite.umd.js lite.umd.js.map
scripts.clean:preact: rimraf dist preact.js preact.js.map preact.esm.js preact.esm.js.map preact.umd.js preact.umd.js.map
scripts.clean:preact-lite: rimraf dist preact-lite.js preact-lite.js.map preact-lite.esm.js preact-lite.esm.js.map preact-lite.umd.js preact-lite.umd.js.map
